Text: My bad, the tracker I used is dead (haven't used it since late 2010). I'm seeding it, though, don't worry. You'll just have to go through DHT instead.

Apologies for the inconvenience, but please add the OpenBT and PublicBT trackers as below:

udp://tracker.publicbt.com:80/announce

udp://tracker.openbittorrent.com:80/announce

Once again, very sorry for the inconvenience. Hope you can still enjoy!
